page.title: 06Gainsborough Stud
page.content:
Gainsborough Stud is situated in Woolton Hill. It was built in the year 1885. The Gainsborough Stud was named after their greatest horse Gainsborough, who lived from 1915 till 1945. { The Prince of Dubai, Mactoum- al-mactoum the owner of Gainsborough Stud, employs only ten to eleven people in the winter, but in the summer he employs more. The Gainsborough Stud owns one hundred and seventy seven horses but there are only forty at the stud at the moment.
Their biggest horse is about sixteen- three hands, she is a mare called Sherpie. There are about eighty stables with a few special stables for stallions.Gainsborough Stud's usual racing ground is Newbury.
